description: File defining a week/level in V-slice FNF

version.description: A version of the level format this file uses. This can controll thethever certain features are available to you, or if this file will load at all.

name.description: Week's title in the top right part of a story menu screen.

visible.description: Controls thethever this week and it's songs can be played by the player.

titleAsset.description: A graphic to use for this week in a week selector

props.description: A list of props to render on the background of this week

assetPath.description: A path to the image/sparrow sprite to use for this prop

scale.description: A scale for this prop's sprite

alpha.description: Controls visible should this prop be form 1 (completely visible) to 0 (invisible)

danceEvery.description: How often (in beats) should this prop bop to the music

isPixel.description: Controls whethever this prop should be treated as a pixel art (which disables anti-aliasing)

offsets.description: An offset in which this prop should be placed in

animations.description: A set of animations available for this prop (If empty, sprite will be static)

offsets.description: Offset from the prop's real position when playing this animation

flipY.description: Whethever to flip Y axis of this prop when playing this animation

frameRate.description: How many frames to play of this animation in 1 second.

prefix.description: Prefix of all frames making up this animation. Optional for 'Packer' props.

name.description: A name of this prop's animation.

looped.description: Whethever this animation should repeat itself after finishing.

flipX.description: Whethever to flip X axis of this prop when playing this animation

frameIndices.description: A list of frame numbers to use for this animation. Empty list will use all frames.

background.description: Path to the image to use as a background for week's props. Alternatively you can put here a color code if you want to use plain color as a background.

songs.description: A list of songs that this week consists of. They will be played in the order you put them here.
